title: How to Make Kashmiri Bombay Tea

steps.headline: Get the Bombay tea leaves ready to add.
Keep the kettle on the gas stove and turn it on.
Add half a spoon of tea leaves to the water.
Note the change in the color of the water.
steps.description: It will turn a light brown color.

steps.headline: Let the water boil for some time.
steps.description: This will allow the tea leaves to steep.

steps.headline: Note the transparent yellow color being emitted by the saffron threads.
Powder a cinnamon stick.
steps.description: This can be done with a food processor, grinder or using a mortar and pestle. Or, buy very fresh pre-ground cinnamon

steps.headline: Add the ground cinnamon to the boiling tea.
steps.description: Steep it for some more time.

steps.headline: Mix the tea once again thoroughly.
Add milk to the tea.
steps.description: Mix it in well with a spoon.

steps.headline: Add the almonds into the tea.
steps.description: Add sugar also. Mix well once again.

steps.headline: Allow the tea to steep on a low flame/over low heat to infuse the flavor through it.
Serve the tea in a cup.

text: Fill a kettle with water.  Get the Bombay tea leaves ready to add.  Keep the kettle on the gas stove and turn it on.  Add half a spoon of tea leaves to the water.  Note the change in the color of the water. It will turn a light brown color. Let the water boil for some time. This will allow the tea leaves to steep. Add few strands of saffron.  Note the transparent yellow color being emitted by the saffron threads.  Mix all the contents well.  Powder a cinnamon stick. This can be done with a food processor, grinder or using a mortar and pestle. Or, buy very fresh pre-ground cinnamon Add the ground cinnamon to the boiling tea. Steep it for some more time. Mix the tea once again thoroughly.  Add milk to the tea. Mix it in well with a spoon. Take a few almonds.  Add the almonds into the tea. Add sugar also. Mix well once again. Allow the tea to steep on a low flame/over low heat to infuse the flavor through it.  Serve the tea in a cup.
